title: vanna mayilOn
sahitya:
vanna mayilOn ponnaDi pOTrinAl innalE urAdenrum irukkalAm manamE nI


anupallavi

  tannaDiyAr paDum tunbam tuDaikkavE kunrelAm Eri ninru kuDi koNDirukkum


caraNam    cinna vayadilum pinnE kannip-paruvattilum kaNDa kanavil kAdal koNDa kumari vaLLi
tannai maNam puriyat-tAnum priyam koNDu annALait-tinaippunam tannil aNaiya vanda
